com.sun.lwuit
Class CheckBox

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.lwuit.Component
      com.sun.lwuit.Label
          com.sun.lwuit.Button
              com.sun.lwuit.CheckBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.sun.lwuit.animations.Animation, com.sun.lwuit.events.StyleListener
public class CheckBox
extends Button

Checkbox is a button that can be selected or deselected, and which displays its state to the user.
